title: 3-Bun Matte Mugi-Senpai
alternative_title: 3-bu Matte Mugi-senpai ; Mugi-senpai ; Wait 3 Minute, Mugi-senpai ; Wait 3 Minutes ; 3分待って むぎ先輩 ; 3分待ってむぎ先輩
status: 3-bu Matte Mugi-senpai ; Mugi-senpai ; Wait 3 Minute, Mugi-senpai ; Wait 3 Minutes ; 3分待って むぎ先輩 ; 3分待ってむぎ先輩
description:
Description :
        The noodles I eat with Mugi-senpai are the most delicious!

Shio Yuasa, a university student who continues her research day and night and Tsumugi Yakushiji, a graduate student responsible for her education. Today, the two work hard in university life and research and stay in the laboratory late at night. I ended up with cup noodles as a reward. A story about a university science student's youth, research, love and pasta.
